text: National Folk Museum of Korea () is a museum in Jongno District, Seoul. It was opened in 1945, and reopened in Gyeongbok Palace in 1993. ==Other websites== * National Folk Museum of Korea Category:20th-century establishments in Korea Category:1945 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in South Korea Category:1993 establishments in Asia Category:National museums of South Korea
title: National Folk Museum of Korea
